scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm i && cd ../server && npm i
scripts.cover:client: cd client && npm run coverage && npx nyc merge .nyc_output ../.nyc_output/client.js
scripts.cover:server: cd server && npm run coverage && npx nyc merge .nyc_output ../.nyc_output/server.js
scripts.coverage: npm run cover:client && npm run cover:server && npm run cover:report
